home.title: BratScope
home.description: An AI-driven experimental model for early detection of brain tumors through MRI analysis.

upload.title: Upload MRI Scan
upload.desc: Submit a high-resolution MRI scan of the brain for analysis.

analysis.title: AI-Powered Detection
analysis.desc: Our deep learning model examines the scan for potential tumor indicators.

results.title: Analytical Insights
results.desc: Receive a probability score and preliminary insights from the AI model.

footer.description: AI-powered brain tumor detection through MRI analysis.
footer.disclaimer: This tool does not replace medical diagnosis.

upload.title: BratScope MRI Analysis
upload.description: Upload an MRI scan or capture one with your camera. Our AI will analyze it for potential brain tumor indicators.

dataset.title: Dataset & AI Model
dataset.description: BratScope utilizes the BraTS 2021 dataset, a collection of MRI scans for brain tumor segmentation research.

model.title: AI Model
model.description: The model is based on 3D U-Net and has been optimized with advanced preprocessing and transfer learning.

github.title: GitHub Repository
github.description: Access the source code, scripts, and documentation. Feel free to explore or contribute.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: If you have any inquiries or would like to collaborate, feel free to reach out via WhatsApp, email, or connect through GitHub and LinkedIn.

form.title: Send a Message
form.error: Please fill in both fields before sending.

uploaddicom.title: Upload MRI Scan
uploaddicom.description: Upload an MRI scan in NIfTI (.nii, .nii.gz) or DICOM (.dcm) format. The AI model will analyze it.
uploaddicom.drag_drop: Drag & drop an MRI scan (.nii, .nii.gz, .dcm) or click to select
uploaddicom.invalid_file: Invalid file type. Please upload a NIfTI (.nii, .nii.gz) or DICOM (.dcm) file.
uploaddicom.invalid_nifti: Invalid NIfTI file. Please check the format.

about.title: About BratScope
about.image_alt: MRI scan representing AI brain tumor detection
about.description_1: This AI-powered project focuses on analyzing MRI scans to assist in brain tumor research.
about.description_2: Using deep learning, the system identifies patterns that may contribute to advancements in radiology and neuroscience.
about.disclaimer: This system is not a diagnostic tool. Consult a medical professional for health concerns.

research.title: Ongoing Research
research.desc: This project is in continuous development, improving AI accuracy.

analysis.title: AI-Assisted Analysis
analysis.desc: BratScope explores AI's role in brain imaging but is not a medical device.

experimental.title: Experimental Model
experimental.desc: Still under testing. Not for clinical use. Consult a doctor for any symptoms.

consultation.title: Professional Consultation
consultation.desc: For an accurate diagnosis, seek a certified medical professional.
